long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Read like a PRO. ExplainTXT supercharges your reading experience. Use it as an AI summarizer, text explainer, and a tool to help you understand any text really fast.

Features:

✨ Explain: Get quick short explanations.
❓ Ask Questions: Ask specific questions about your text.
👨‍🎓 Set Your Level: Customize explanations to fit your knowledge level.
🌍 Translate: Choose the language for your explanations.
📚 Library: Save explanations and access them anytime for easy review.

Join our community and become a Super Reader!
